Bookings
Our services are available from 6AM to 10 PM, all days. You can schedule an order from our website, our app or by calling us at 7827–121–121 We will ask for your details (Name, Address, Email ID, Date and Time of pick up) on a confirmation call when you order through our website or on call. Our agent will be at your doorstep at your booked time slot, however, you will be duly notified in advance if there is any change. Our agent will call you before your pick up and drop off to confirm the timing. All garments will be delivered within 24 hours. It may get extended due to weather conditions, natural calamities, or local parameters such as traffic, etc. All instructions should be intimated to our agent during the pick-up. All items should be counted and handed over to the pick-up agent and also counted during the drop off. Any mismatch or loss should be informed within 48 hours of the delivery. We take no guarantee of color bleed during laundry.

Payment
 We offer multiple payment options i.e. Cash on Delivery, Debit card/Credit card swipe. The invoice for the order will be generated at the time of pick up and will be sent to your email. You have an option of generating a copy of the invoice at any time during an ongoing order. No hard copy of the invoice will be handed over, unless requested for. The exact bill amount will be intimated to you by SMS as well as email, shortly after the pick up. A bill estimator is available to you at all times on the app as well as the website. Cancellations You will have multiple opportunities to cancel the order. It can be done during the confirmation call or when our agent calls you before the pick up, or even when the agent comes at your doorstep. The order can be cancelled after the pick up subjected to the level of progress of the cleaning process and it will lie under the jurisdiction of Dhodu.
